items.sentence: Tom has to go to Australia with us next week.
I don't think I know the girl talking to Tom.
Tom said that I didn't have to do that today.
I've never been stuck for so long in my life.
They stayed at home because it was very cold.
My mother gets up the earliest every morning.
I hear that Tom's widow has gotten remarried.
Tom put too much mustard on his ham sandwich.
Tom put too much mustard in the potato salad.
Tom has pictures of his family in his wallet.
